children: “Champions” is a celebratory rap anthem, featuring some of the game’s most popular rappers. It was released as the first single of G.O.O.D. Music’s upcoming
.  It was released on iTunes on June 12th, 2016.
Kanye West is joined by a whopping seven artists, including
—three artists he’s never worked with before.
on Big Sean and Ian Conner’s Snapchat. It later premiered on
minutes after Kanye announced it on
described how the Gucci Mane feature came to fruition.
The minimalistic single artwork is a nod to
(which featured 2 Chainz and Big Sean) with white covers that read, “No Artwork” and “No Artwork 2,” respectively. According to
with Pusha, Kanye designed the “No Artwork” cover:

[I asked him] what’s the artwork? He was like, there’s no artwork. That was the extreme theme, and our first way of implementing what we were discussing about the stark and minimal, art where the primary focus is on the music.
